subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In his second game as a Nugget, Allen Iverson offered his usual crossover thrills. But it was his dazzling passing that paced his new teammates against the undermanned Boston Celtics.
snippet: In his second game as a Nugget, Allen Iverson offered his usual crossover thrills. But it was his dazzling passing that paced his new teammates against the undermanned Boston Celtics.
